title: Beta Blessings
description: What if your blessing is still in progress? In “Beta Blessings,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church takes a look at blessings that are still in the early stages – and reminds us not to give up before we see them come to pass.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: What if your blessing is still in progress? In “Beta Blessings,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church takes a look at blessings that are still in the early stages – and reminds us not to give up before we see them come to pass.
